title: Community Health Education Masterclass
subject: Health Education
tutorName: Mr. A. Ade — Senior Health Educator
short: Develop practical communication and facilitation skills for effective community health programs.
impactFocus: Empowers field workers and educators to lead impactful community sessions with confidence.

title: Applied Physics for Health Technicians
subject: Applied Physics
tutorName: Ms. B. Chukwu — Diagnostic Science Specialist
short: Bridges the gap between physical science principles and real-world health applications.
impactFocus: Enhances diagnostic accuracy and problem-solving capacity among health technicians.

title: Educational Leadership & Communication Workshop
subject: Education & Management
short: Train to become a confident communicator and facilitator in academic and community contexts.
impactFocus: Equips educators with the mindset and strategies for leadership, mentorship, and sustained learner engagement.

title: Community Mobilization & Behavior Change
subject: Social Mobilization
tutorName: Dr. D. Balogun — Social Impact Consultant
short: Learn practical frameworks for mobilizing communities and promoting health behavior change.
impactFocus: Prepares community agents for real-world interventions and participatory communication programs.

title: Effective Data Collection & Field Reporting
subject: Monitoring & Evaluation
short: Gain hands-on experience in structured data collection, verification, and reporting for health projects.
impactFocus: Improves accuracy and credibility of field reports through data-driven decision making.
